title: Microsoft Graph Transformer
description: Microsoft Graph Transformer for Open Integration Hub (based on https://github.com/openintegrationhub/getmyinvoice-transformer).

contactDataFromOih.title: Transform contact data from OIH
contactDataFromOih.description: Transform the incoming contact data from OIH

contactDataToOih.title: Transform contact data to OIH
contactDataToOih.description: Transform the incoming contact data to OIH

eventDataFromOih.title: Transform event data from OIH
eventDataFromOih.description: Transform the incoming event data from OIH

eventDataToOih.title: Transform event data to OIH
eventDataToOih.description: Transform the incoming event data to OIH
